verses.verse: <S%G1161>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> those <S%G2250>days<s%>, <S%G1565>that<s%> there went <S%G1831>out<s%> a <S%G1378>decree<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G2541>Cæsar<s%> <S%G828>Augustus<s%>, that <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%> should be <S%G583>taxed<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> to be <S%G583>taxed<s%>, every <S%G1538>one<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G1161>also<s%> went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G3478>Nazareth<s%>, <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2449>Judæa<s%>, <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G965>Bethlehem<s%>; <S%G1223>(because<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1511>was<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3965>lineage<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%>:)
To be <S%G583>taxed<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3423>engaged<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%>, <S%G5607>being<s%> great with <S%G1471>child<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> so it <S%G1096>was<s%>, <S%G1722>that<s%>, while <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1511>were<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%>, the <S%G2250>days<s%> were <S%G4130>accomplished<s%> that <S%G846>she<s%> should be <S%G5088>delivered<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> she brought <S%G5088>forth<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G4416>firstborn<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4683>wrapped<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> in swaddling <S%G4683>clothes<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G347>laid<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G5336>manger<s%>; <S%G1360>because<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5117>room<s%> for <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2646>inn<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5561>country<s%> <S%G4166>shepherds<s%> abiding in the <S%G63>field<s%>, <S%G5442>keeping<s%> <S%G5438>watch<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4167>flock<s%> by <S%G3571>night<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> came <S%G2186>upon<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> shone round <S%G4034>about<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G5399>were<s%> <S%G3173>severely<s%> <S%G5399>afraid<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5399>Fear<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, I <S%G2097>bring<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> good <S%G2097>news<s%> <S%G5479>of<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G2992>to<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%>.

<S%G3754>For<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> is <S%G5088>born<s%> this <S%G4594>day<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%> a <S%G4990>Savior<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> shall be a <S%G4592>sign<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%>; You shall <S%G2147>find<s%> the <S%G1025>baby<s%> wrapped in swaddling <S%G4683>clothes<s%>, <S%G2749>lying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G5336>manger<s%>.

<S%G1391>Glory<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5310>highest<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%>, good <S%G2107>will<s%> <S%G1722>toward<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> were gone <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, the <S%G4166>shepherds<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G240>another<s%>, Let <S%G1330>us<s%> <S%G1211>now<s%> <S%G1330>go<s%> even <S%G2193>to<s%> <S%G965>Bethlehem<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4487>thing<s%> which is come to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> has made <S%G1107>known<s%> to <S%G444>us<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> with <S%G4692>haste<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G429>found<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1025>baby<s%> <S%G2749>lying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G5037>manger<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when they had <S%G1492>seen<s%> <S%G1232>it<s%>, they made known <S%G4012>abroad<s%> the <S%G4487>saying<s%> which was <S%G2980>told<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G3813>child<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> they that <S%G191>heard<s%> it <S%G2296>wondered<s%> <S%G4012>at<s%> those things <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G2980>told<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G4314>shepherds<s%>.
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G4933>kept<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G4487>things<s%>, and <S%G4820>pondered<s%> them <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G4166>shepherds<s%> <S%G1994>returned<s%>, <S%G1392>glorifying<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G134>praising<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the things <S%G3739>that<s%> they had <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>seen<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> it was <S%G2980>told<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G3638>eight<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> were <S%G4130>accomplished<s%> for the <S%G4059>circumcising<s%> of the <S%G3813>child<s%>, <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> was <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2424>JESUS<s%>, which was so <S%G2564>named<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G4815>conceived<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2532>womb<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2512>of<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2512>purification<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%> were <S%G4130>accomplished<s%>, they <S%G321>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>, to <S%G3936>present<s%> him to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>;

<S%G2531>(As<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G730>male<s%> that <S%G1272>opens<s%> the <S%G3388>womb<s%> shall be <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>;)

<S%G2532>And<s%> to <S%G1325>offer<s%> a <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> that which is <S%G2046>said<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, A <S%G2201>pair<s%> of <S%G5167>turtledoves<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3502>young<s%> <S%G4058>pigeons<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, there <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> was <S%G4826>Simeon<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> was <S%G1342>just<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2126>devout<s%>, <S%G4327>waiting<s%> for the <S%G3874>consolation<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1203>Lord<s%>, <S%G3568>now<s%> let <S%G630>you<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G630>depart<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%>:

<S%G3739>Which<s%> you have <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G2596>before<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%>;
A <S%G5457>light<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G602>lighten<s%> the <S%G1484>Nations<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2992>of<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G2296>marveled<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> those things which were <S%G2980>spoken<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G2258>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4826>Simeon<s%> <S%G2127>blessed<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>, <S%G2400>Behold<s%>, <S%G3778>this<s%> child is <S%G2749>set<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G4431>fall<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> rising <S%G386>again<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> a <S%G4592>sign<s%> which shall be spoken <S%G483>against<s%>;

<S%G1161>(Yes<s%>, a <S%G4501>sword<s%> shall pierce <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>,) <S%G3704>that<s%> the <S%G1261>thoughts<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2588%G99999>hearts<s%> may be <S%G601>revealed<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> one <S%G451>Anna<s%>, a <S%G4398>prophetess<s%>, the <S%G2364>daughter<s%> of <S%G5323>Phanuel<s%>, <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G768>Aser<s%>: <S%G846>she<s%> was <S%G4260>of<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4260>age<s%>, and had <S%G2198>lived<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> a <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1722>virginity<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>she<s%> was a <S%G5503>widow<s%> of <S%G5613>about<s%> eighty and <S%G3589>four<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G868>departed<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%>, but <S%G3000>served<s%> God with <S%G3521>fastings<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1162>prayers<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3778>day<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> they had <S%G5055>performed<s%> all <S%G537>things<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, they <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G1519>to<s%> their <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G837>grew<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> grew <S%G2901>strong<s%> in <S%G4151>spirit<s%>, <S%G4137>filled<s%> with <S%G4678>wisdom<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>Now<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1118>parents<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G2094>year<s%> at the <S%G1859>feast<s%> of the <S%G3957>passover<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> he <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> years <S%G2094>old<s%>, <S%G846>they<s%> went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G1485>custom<s%> of the <S%G1859>feast<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when they had <S%G5048>fulfilled<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%>, <S%G1722>as<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%>, the <S%G3816>child<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> stayed <S%G5278>behind<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%> not of <S%G3756>it<s%>.
